page.title: 05HOUSING
page.content: Housing within the area is predominantly owner-occupied, though there is a small development of "Housing Executive"{(council-type) houses at Ligoniel. There are two main concentrations of{owner-occupied {houses}in the area 1. At Ligoniel and 2. At Ballysillan, where a new development of 'semis' are currently being built beside the existing housing at Kilcoole and Mountcoole. The other owner-occupied houses are spread very widely throughout the area with most of these houses sited on land at least 2 acres in area and many of which are{farm dwellings.
